verify.code: () => { const c = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.creatures; const glowing = Object.values(c).find(e => e.name && e.name.toLowerCase().includes('glow')); return glowing ? { success: true } : { success: false, message: 'No glowing creature found' }; }
